column7: Progressive development of the concepts and skills in DANC 107; for the non-dance major. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Two semesters of DANC 107 or equivalent or consent of instructor. For non-dance majors.
column9: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Two semesters of DANC 107 or equivalent or consent of instructor. For non-dance majors.
column11: Student costs for supplies and concert tickets are approx. $30. Written assignments and concert attendance is required.
